original: 龐德部將。關羽水淹七軍，于禁、龐德所率部隊潰敗，龐德向仍緊隨身側的成何慷慨陳詞後，以此明志，奮戰不降。
text: Pound General. Guan Yu flooded the seven armies, and the troops led by Yu Jin and Pound were defeated. After Pound made a generous statement to Cheng He, who was still close by his side, he made clear his will and did not surrender.
